name: fullstack-template
description: A modern, production-ready fullstack application template featuring a React frontend and Express backend, both built with TypeScript.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
